page.title: 12HOME LIFE - FAMILY
page.content: I live at 99 Belfield Road, Accrington. My name is Donna. I have {two sisters}and{two brothers}who are older than me. My youngest sister is called Debbie - she lives at home with me, but my other sister Dawn lives in Huncoat about three miles from my home. My youngest brother is called David - he is always fighting and arguing which channel the television is going to be on. My other brother is called Dale - he is a{mechanic.}My dad is also a mechanic. My mum works at Liberton Printers making{bingo and {raffle tickets}for clubs. We have two Yorkshire terriers, a cat, three mice and a hamster. The dogs are called Muffy and Bonny and the cat's called Tiger. The mice and hamsters are called Pinky, Rasputin, Stardust and Hammy. Donna Reynolds.
